EMCA no subjectNeighbors yesterday four cars were vandalized at Bomar St The glass windows were shatered My cousin from Michigan was visiting me The window behind the drivers seat was broken The police was at Bomar and Grant with the same problem I am sick and tired of this abuse And yesterday I was also ashamed Its not only the broken glass is all the secondary effects that this kind of incidents cause to the victim And the perpetrators are probably laughing at all of us Because for them is probably a joke I am sorry of giving all of you this news in this beautiful day but we need to be aware Happy Holidays Feliz Navidad Hedda Bomar
